metadata.Title: CVE-2020-13327 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab Runner affecting all versionsstarting from 13.4.0 before 13.4.2, all versions starting from 13.3.0before 13.3.7, all versions starting from 13.2.0 before 13.2.10. InsecureRunner Configuration in Kubernetes Environments

criterions.comment: gitlab-ci-multi-runner: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
